subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Bretagne-Séché Environnement, a cycling team from the Brittany region of France, has a slim budget, and it is a victory for the team merely to be participating in the Tour de France.
snippet: Bretagne-Séché Environnement, a cycling team from the Brittany region of France, has a slim budget, and it is a victory for the team merely to be participating in the Tour de France.
